metadata.title: Christmas Santa Claus And Deers Kitchen Aprons For Women Men Plus Size With 2 Pockets Waterproof Adjustable Neck Strap For Thanksgiving,Christmas,Cooking,Baking & Painting
features: 【Material Description】Christmas Santa Claus And Deers apron Waterproof Oxford Cloth (Polyester).
【Product Performance】It Is Resistant To Dirt And Abrasion, And Can Protect Your Clothes From Oil Pollution. Adjustable Tie, Length Can Be Adjusted Freely, Easy To Put On, And Take Off.
【Applicable Scene】 It Is Very Suitable For Cooking, Flower Arrangement, Painting, Housework, Etc. It Is A Must-Have Product For Chefs, Waiters, Painters, Etc.
【Accessories Structure】The Neckline Of The Apron Is Designed With Adjustable Straps, The Waist Is Tied, And The Two Front Pockets Are Connected Together.
【Washing Instructions】Hand Wash Or Gentle Machine Wash, Air Dry, Iron At Low Temperature, Do Not Bleach.
description: Do You Want To Keep Your Clothes Clean When You Cooking Or Working? Aprons With Pockets And Adjustable Height Are Your Best Choice.
We Bring You The Most Economical And Useful Aprons For Women And Men.
Great Gift Idea For Moms And Dads, Mother'S - Father'S Day, And Christmas.

Here’s What A Few Of Our Ravingfans Are Saying, "Very Impressed With The Quality And Beautiful Patterns Of These Aprons! Would Recommend!", "Good. Nice Water-Resistant.","Very Good Value For Money :-)"
With The Adjustable Neck Strap And Extra-Long Ties That Can Wrap Around And Tied In The Front, The Apron Fits Most Sizes And Is Suitable For Women And Men.

Specially Designed To Be Machine Washed Makes Cleaning The Apron Extremely Easy. Fabric Stands Up To Multiple Washes For Easy Care After Use. Shrink Wear And Tear Resistance, Easy To Clean And Maintain.

Aprons Are Used In The Kitchen Restaurant Garden. Perfect For Home, Commercial, Industrial Uses. Whether You Are An Avid Cooker Interested In Culinary Arts, Or Working As A Painter, Bbq Host, Or Need Some Protection From The Elements, This Apron Will Be Able To Keep Your Clothes Clean Underneath.

title: YEKOO Red And White Christmas Chef Aprons With Pockets
